gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 115, Celtics 96
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Celtics, 115-96. Kawhi Leonard recorded 26 points and seven rebounds for the Clippers, while James Harden added nine points, eight rebounds and seven assists in the victory. Jayson Tatum tallied 21 points and 11 rebounds for the Celtics in the losing effort. The Clippers have won five straight games as they improve to 30-14 on the season, while the Celtics fall to 35-11.
